document.full_text: the ultimate fighting championship claims to have the toughest drug-testing in north american sport but doping officials disagree and have challenged them to get serious about ensuring their sport is clean.
document.title: fighting-anti-doping chiefs say ufc must get serious
lines_and_colors: the ultimate fighting championship claims to have the toughest drug-testing in north american sport but doping officials disagree and have challenged them to get serious about ensuring their sport is clean.
